title: What type of girl does Jimin want? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simple version: Jimin wants a nice, cute girl who is smaller than him  LONG VERSION: Age Range: 1991/1993–2003 Height: 158cm - 161cm Type of Nationality: Australian, European, Chinese, Filipina girl, or Korean. He wants to get married at the age of 35/36. Kids: 3 boys a girl who truly loves him and doesn’t look away; must give him the love that he needs and he will return it.His ideal girl is: -Smaller -Shorter (than 170cm because his height is 173cm)-Long straight hair-Hairstyle: Loose bun, short wavy, hair or half-up style.Is caring, cute, loves sharing, and has a big heart.A girl with cute yet simple make-up, wears feminine colours, high/low heels, light shade of lip gloss, doll eye make-up, charismatic and cute at the same time, sexy without trying. He’s attracted to cute lips and eyes.Impresses him with talent (could be one or more. cooking, dancing, etc.)Loves to cuddle; any type of skinship he’ll probably love.He’s extremely flirtatious and would like a girl who responds to him; in short, he may not like shy girls.Loves him as much as he loves her. <3Please remember that this is his ideal type, and ideal types don’t exist. Ideal types are a mesh of complimenting qualities. However, the likelihood of these qualities all being found in a single girl is low, which is why ideal types should not be considered as a standard or expectation, but rather as a figure made only in dreams.  Sources: Jimin (BTS) Facts and Profile (Updated!)~BTS IDEALS TYPES OF GIRLS 2019 💍❤ | ARMY's Amino

He wants a girl that has eyebrow-length black hair and a black belt in tae kwon do. He likes a strong woman who can throw him over her shoulders like a sack of potatoes. She’s the kind of girl who will go with him on trips to Osaka and Saipan, does whatever she can to take care of him and and will rub his upper back whenever he needs it. She has a crazy maknae sense of humor. Maybe she will ask for a ring of special significance, and he will give it to her on stage in a makeshift ceremony the middle of a pop concert in Busan. And she will be exhilarated by him doing so. Oh and her name has to be JungKook. Ask a leading question, get a leading answer.  I’m not saying that Jimin and JungKook are a couple, but I’m triggered by the assumption that Jimin is only into girls. The theory that Jimin and JungKook are a couple is born from circumstantial evidence driven by confirmation bias, however the same thing is true of the theory that Jimin is straight: He dated a girl once (circumstantial) and most people are straight (confirmation bias). Sure, Jimin could be attracted to girls. It’s weird to me that the question used “girl” when the word “person” would have worked just as well.

Jimin, like anyone, would want to be with someone who is kind and caring to him, someone who will support him and love him no matter what. People say Jimin has a “type” or only wants a girl who is like this and that, but I’m not sure where he’s said these things. I’m sure whoever he likes will be someone who he gets along easily no matter how they look, dress etc.. However, I think it’s most likely he’ll go for a Korean girl, as it’s a tradition for the oldest son in Korea to marry a Korean women (although traditions aren’t mandatory they can be broken.) But Jimin has shown many times he likes women of all colour (the struggle comes with the communication) If you want to know this for yourself, I have something to tell you. You are perfect just the way you are, and you don’t need to change yourself to anyone’s standards especially Jimin’s. Forgive me, I don’t know how old you are, but I hope you don’t spend your life trying to impress a man who could be a lot older than you and doesn’t know who you are. It’s a reality a lot of fans have to endure. Please realise what’s important is your own happiness, you should go out and find someone who will love you just for how you are. Hope this helps :)

I think people should take what all the guys say/have said in interviews with a proverbial grain of salt. Imagine if you had to come up with answers to these questions but also knew it was going to reach your millions of fans. I’m not trying to say the guys aren’t genuine, just aware. The marketing strategy for kpop idols seems to be “I’m your BF” so how can they give actual lists and preferences knowing they have millions of fans from all over the world? Fans that come from different backgrounds and nationalities. Maybe back in the day they could be a little more candid but now not so much. All of their answers are general and not overly specific I.e cute, short, nice lips, pretty eyes, nice clothes, long hair, short hair, chill, kind, funny, likes music etc. It can be easily applied to many people. Honestly, I can’t imagine the kind of pressure that goes along with this question.. I’m not trying to dissolution anyone, but some people might take things like this to seriously and it can become unhealthy and depressing. Comparing yourself to these Ideal checklists is normal and can but fun, but don’t let it dictate how you dress, act or treat your body. Again these preferences aren’t set in stone and are for fun. I think all the guys genuinely care about Army. They probably keep their answers general to keep fans interested in them, but also because they don’t want Armies to feel bad about themselves for not matching their personal tastes. Jimin in particular probably wouldn’t want to make someone to feel bad about their appearance. Also, keep in mind a lot of those Interview answers are like 4-6 years old right? Tastes mature and change over time. When you get older you realize love isn’t just about checking boxes. Even if they were being honest then it might not be the same anymore. Again a grain of salt. I don’t know them personally but if I had to venture a guess I would say they will all probably want to date/marry other Korean musicians/ artists/ idols/ actors/ models.People they can relate their passions too. Someone who understands the idol lifestyle, grew up in the same culture, speaks their language and that their parents approve of. Also, doesn't socioeconomic status matter, like a lot in Korea? I would say it’s safe to bet they will probably date someone from a similar “sphere”. I highly doubt any of them would seriously date (marriage in mind) someone not from Korea and also famous-ish … maybe RM, not sure why but I just get that vibe from him lol.

Physical features: Height:160–165cm( the girl should be shorter than him) Weight :45kgs (I know that's a bit too much but whatever…) Long, straight hair. Pale skin. Preferably Korean girl but he says Asian girl works as well. He wants to love just one girl for the rest of his life. He wants his girl to be caring and loving. A girl who can cook for him. He doesn't want long distance relationships cause he feels he won't be able to handle it. He wants to get married at 35 and wants 2 boys( I don't exactly remember ) There are so many qualities but can't remember all so you may go and search the net for details. This was just basic information. Hope it was useful and made you happy. I felt like I was the one when I read all the qualities but reality hit me really hard so I continued sulking and cursing myself… Anyway, it doesn't matter who he gets married to. All I know is that I will support his family and love them forever.

Age:between 1991–2003 Height:158 cm -161 cm weight:40 kg Nationality:prefers australian girls very kind and sincere,would love him for who he is Long straight silky hair big hearted and caring girl wears minimal makeup, wears feminine colors,someone who stands out without wearing a lot of makeup girl who can cook and surprise him can provide comfort and strength for times he needs it will cuddle him and always leave her heart with his never says no to taking photos doesn’t like shy girls,a girl that will flirt with him when he shows off his moves never hides her personality,and always be true to herself
A girl that looks like this   Specific detail: Must be raised in DaeguMust have swagMust be geniusMust have a gun in her bag

Well I will start off with saying that as long as you have a good personality, Jimin is willing to be with you. He hasn’t ever really said anything about age, and if he is willing to be with anyone like he says, age won’t matter because love is love and why limit love to an age depending on what society says? Although if you are shorter and very cute, you probably have a better chance. And for race, i don’t think it matters either, although you probably want to be able to speak korean for communication purposes. And the other things that he’s mentioned are things he usually finds attractive but peeps it won’t matter because when he finds the perfect someone, nothing else will matter except the love they share! Hope this helps and gives realistic optimism! ;)

I think Jimin used to like cute girls in the past, however, after seeing his reaction to Normani and Hwasa I think his ideal type has changed. He likes someone who is curvy, confident, speaks her mind and a good performer. I also think that he prefers a tomboyish girl now from my observations but then again who knows what kind of girl he’ll fall in love with. I also think that out of all of the BTS members Jimin is the most likely to fall in love with a fellow idol and Jhope as well, however, that’s just my assumption we don’t what the future holds.

Cute or sexy~ He want a girl with cute lips, and attractive eyes. He said that it's very important for her to be cute. But he likes when girls look sexy without trying. Tho, he cares more about her cuteness than her curves. Shorties ~ Jimin likes short girls. If you are a new army, then you should know that Jimin is the shortest member (173cm). So, if you are insecure about your height because you're short, just remember that chim chim is still available Fashion, makeup etc~ He loves when a girl can pull out cute and feminine outfits. Example: he loves cute shades of pink, dresses, skirts, over sized and fluffy shirts, and pretty, cute styles in general. He likes when the bottom matches colors with the top. He also likes low AND high heeled shoes. He likes light shades of pink for makeup, and it's best if the makeup looks innocent. And he LOVES a girl who acts cute and girly Hair~ Jimin liked long, straight hair since he was young, and he still does. AGE~ Jiminie wants his girl to be born between 1993 and 2001. Tho, don't worry, age doesn't matter as long as love is present. Our mochi likes girls older and younger than him (even to 9 years). But he wants her to be playful and knows how to have fun and kid around no matter how old she is!!! However, little chim wants to get married at the age of 36. Hope its helpful ~
